foreignData.name: Feuerlied
foreignData.text:
Du kannst während Deiner Versorgungsphase eine Lyrikmarke auf das Feuerlied legen.
{2}{R}, opfere das Feuerlied: Das Feuerlied fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Lyrikmarken auf dem Feuerlied ist.

name: Torch Song
originalText:
During your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Torch Song.
o2o
R, Sacrifice Torch Song: Torch Song deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of verse counters on Torch Song.

rulings.text: Adding a counter is optional. If you forget to add one during your upkeep, you cannot back up and add one later.

text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Torch Song.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Torch Song: It deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of verse counters on Torch Song.
